title: Magnesium Taurate
overview: Magnesium Taurate is a white, odorless, crystalline powder formed by combining magnesium with the amino sulfonic acid taurine. This compound is known for its excellent bioavailability and superior tolerability, making it a preferred magnesium source in cardiovascular and neurological health supplements. It is sparingly soluble in water and provides a synergistic effect from both magnesium and taurine.

specifications.value: Conforms to nutraceutical-grade standards (based on FCC/USP)
Limits on heavy metals, impurities, and microbial counts

features: Cardiovascular Support: Combines two heart-healthy nutrients in one molecule
High Tolerance: Less likely to cause digestive discomfort or laxative effects
Neuroprotective Potential: May support stress, cognition, and sleep quality
Synergistic Effect: Taurine enhances magnesium's bioavailability and function
